Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Massive in scale and filled with bookshelves that line the entire northern and southern walls as well as the floor space in between, this lavishly decorated library is filled with the perfume of books and beeswax candles. Candelabras and chandeliers in gilt bronze illuminate the honeyed hues of the oak bookshelves, the colors complemented by the amber and bronze floral motifs painted on the frescoed walls to the east and west. Large leaded glass windows fill the frescoed walls, each one outfitted with upholstered windows seats that are dressed in golden bronze sheer silk drapes that hang from the gold-accented oak cantilever ceiling overhead to pool in sumptuous folds along the parquet floor. Small accent rugs in similar golden hues reduce the echo of footsteps in the cavernous space, the rich multicolored leather bindings of the books further dulling any sound.

Large leaded glass windows fill the frescoed walls, each one outfitted with upholstered windows seats that are dressed in golden bronze sheer silk drapes that hang from the gold-accented oak cantilever ceiling overhead to pool in sumptuous folds along the parquet floor. Small accent rugs in similar golden hues reduce the echo of footsteps in the cavernous space, the rich multicolored leather bindings of the books further dulling any sound.

Massive in scale and filled with bookshelves that line the entire northern and southern walls as well as the floor space in between, this lavishly decorated library is filled with the perfume of books and beeswax candles. Candelabras and chandeliers in gilt bronze illuminate the honeyed hues of the oak bookshelves, the colors complemented by the amber and bronze floral motifs painted on the frescoed walls to the east and west. Large leaded glass windows fill the frescoed walls, each one outfitted with upholstered windows seats that are dressed in golden bronze sheer silk drapes that hang from the gold-accented oak cantilever ceiling overhead to pool in sumptuous folds along the parquet floor. Small accent rugs in similar golden hues reduce the echo of footsteps in the cavernous space, the rich multicolored leather bindings of the books further dulling any sound.
an arched double door leading north

Each side of the arched double door leading to the north is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
